name: VEVT
description:
===PRESS THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON ON THE DOWNRIGHT SIDE OF THE GAME TO EXPAND IT===

Twine "game" developed during the SP Jam 2014, a brazilian game marathon that took place between august 29th and 31st of 2014.

The theme of this game jam was: Contrast

You can send me your feedback at:

Twitter: @rurounikz
